tasks.task: Nutrient Management Practices for Small Livestock Farms
subtasks: Define small farm criteria (USDA and EPA)
Identify common challenges for small farms (small acreage, limited finances, lack of experience)
Discuss manure storage requirements (dry, level, impermeable location, 100 feet from water)
Plan for manure spreading and disposal (composting, centralized facilities, neighbors' concerns)
Manage stormwater runoff and erosion control
Control animal access to waterways and implement fencing
Utilize sacrifice areas and rotational grazing
Address neighbor concerns and urban surroundings
Develop a farm map and understand land features
Use BMPs and resources for nutrient management planning
